mdRecord.dcterms:title: Massacres des 2, 3, 4, 5 et 6 Septembre 1792
Massacres of September 2, 3, 4, 5, and 6, 1792
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Armed men attack people in the street, where several people lay sprawled out on the ground. Two men on horses and several men and women watch
